item.title: Trump posts AI image of himself as Pope amid Vatican's search for new pontiff
item.description: President Donald Trump posted an AI-generated image of himself as the pope on Truth Social as cardinals get ready to vote for a new pontiff on may 7.

item.title: Rising Dem star distances herself from 'inclusive language' as newsletters reveal a different story
item.description: A U.S. Senate candidate is distancing herself from gender-inclusive language, despite including “inclusive language" in her constituent newsletters.
